name: IS IT A GAME ??
description:
IH! THIS IS A FUN PUZZLE GAME .

IT IS MY FIRST GAME JAM EVER.

WHERE YOU GET CONFUSED THAT YOU ARE PLAYING A GAME OR NOT .

YOUR GOAL IS TO FIND THE EXIT BUTTON TO QUIT THE GAME.

NOT VERY HARD JUST GO WITH THE FLOW.

CONTROLS :- "A"--TO MOVE LEFT, "D"--TO MOVE RIGHT, "W"--TO JUMP.

SOME HIDDEN CONTROLS SOLVE THE PUZZLE TO KNOW THEM

IF YOU PLAY THE GAME PLEASE GIVE SOME FEEDBACK

THANKS FOR PLAYING!!!!
